name: Necrosphere
description:
Necrosphere is a (really hard) bite-sized metroidvania game you control WITH ONLY TWO KEYS!


Necrosphere is where you go when you die, regardless of being good or bad. You don’t see other people around there, and you don’t have anything to do except to wait eternally. Soon as Agent Terry Cooper hits the Necrosphere, he learns about the portals that can take him back to the world of the living (also called Normalsphere), and his quest to escape the afterlife is set.Features
  • Innovative controls: Only two buttons!
  • At least 2.5 hours of tough, NO FILLER gameplay!
  • One big, maze-like universe!
  • Deliciously frustrating!
  • Spandex ballet suit!
